definition: to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Every bike rider should wear a safety helmet.
sentences.chinese: 每个骑车人都应当佩戴安全帽。

sentences.english: Sad about the move, I bicycled down the hill to Helen's.
sentences.chinese: 因为要搬走，我很伤心，骑车下山来到海伦家。

sentences.english: Crosswalks even got a fresh coat of paint to encourage walking and biking.
sentences.chinese: 过街天桥上都挂上鼓励步行和骑车的条幅。

sentences.english: Every day, Thu takes her husband from their hired room to their factories.
sentences.chinese: 每天，阿彤都骑车把丈夫从出租屋带到工厂。

sentences.english: After they rode their bikes for two and a half hours, they arrived at the Ming Tombs.
sentences.chinese: 在他们骑车两个半小时后，他们到达了明陵。

sentences.english: Similarly, bike riders often suffer from shoulder and back injuries and saddle-soreness.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，骑车者也被肩，背部疼痛和氨酸痛所折磨着。

sentences.english: I had to cycle home in the rain and came in looking like a downed rat.
sentences.chinese: 我只能冒雨骑车回家，进门的时候湿得像一只落汤鸡。

sentences.english: Vicky cycled alone through the Rocky Mountains down to the western United States.
sentences.chinese: 姬莹一人骑车穿过洛基山脉抵达美国西部。

sentences.english: It is now used primarily for leisure boating, walking, angling and cycling.
sentences.chinese: 现在主要用于休闲划船，散步，垂钓和骑车。

sentences.english: One of the ads depicts a father teaching a son how to ride.
sentences.chinese: 在其中一个广告里，描写的是父亲教儿子骑车。

sentences.english: Always require that your child wear a bike helmet, no matter how long or short the ride is.
sentences.chinese: 通常规定不管骑车时间长短，你的孩子都要戴上头盔。

sentences.english: One day I rode bike to school as usual.
sentences.chinese: 一天，我像往常一样骑车去上学。

sentences.english: More and more mountain bikers are moonriding — speeding down trails.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多骑山地车的人喜欢骑车沿小道飞速而下。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, 18 people walked or biked past her without stopping.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，有18人步行或骑车路过，没有停下来。

sentences.english: Mike: Xiao Fang, why did you ride your bike to work today?
sentences.chinese: 小方，你今天怎么骑车子来上班？

sentences.english: Fans were delighted to see their heroes riding with the hoi polloi .
sentences.chinese: 拥趸们欣喜的看到他们的英雄们在和大家伙一起骑车。

definition: to ride (a bicycle, horse, motorbike etc)/cycling/horseback riding/motorbike riding/a ride/CL:次[ci4]
to take the car, bus, train etc
to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses
